analysis.key_quote: By removing civil servants from the system that assesses how good they are at their job and instead puts them directly subject to the Executive branch, civil servants would be required to modify their beliefs and performance based on the political agenda of whoever is in office.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of civil service and the erosion of merit-based assessments, emphasizing the importance of independent civil servants who can disagree with the Executive without fear of dismissal.
